Package com.redis.foundation.ds

Class DSCriterionEntry

java.lang.Object
com.redis.foundation.ds.DSCriterionEntry
public class DSCriterionEntry extends Object
A DSCriterionEntry is responsible for encapsulating a criterion and a boolean operator. It is exclusively referenced from within a DSCriteria object.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Al Cole

      Returns the count of values associated with this criterion entry.
      Returns:
      Count of values.

    • isSimple

      public boolean isSimple()
      Returns true if the criterion entry is simple in its nature. A simple criteria is one where its boolean operators is AND and its values is single.
      Returns:
      true or false

    • getCriterions

      public ArrayList<DSCriterion> getCriterions()
      Returns an array of criterions being managed by this criterion entry.
      Returns:
      An array of criterions.
